mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MEMBER( MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NICKNM, MEM_STATE, LAST_LOGIN_DATE ) VALUES( #{memId}, #{memPassword}, #{memNicknm}, #{memState}, #{lastLoginDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NICKNM, MEM_STATE, LAST_LOGIN_DATE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_STATE = 'ACTIVE'
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PASSWORD, MEM_NICKNM, MEM_STATE, LAST_LOGIN_DATE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_NO = #{value}
SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_NICKNM, LAST_LOGIN_DATE FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_STATE = 'ACTIVE' ORDER BY MEM_NO ASC
SELECT MEM_ID FROM TB_MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = #{value}
